components.html:
If you work for an agency or arm's length body, refer to the guidance on your local intranet.

To report an IT incident, for example a lost or stolen device, or unauthorised access to an IT system, call 0800 917 5148.

You can use this form to report a security incident, for example:

- loss of personal information
- unauthorised access to documents
- items left unsecured, like a key cabinet
- suspicious people, vehicles or packages

To report a security incident, you need to:

- [complete this form](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W96cpkomUjSQH5qca-SGsUcvqpMfJa85/view?usp=sharing)
- email it to [security@justice.gov.uk](#)

You can also [report a security incident anonymously](/). 

Read about:

- our [security policy](#)
- protecting [personal information](#) at MoJ

heading: Report a security incident
lede: To protect the public and maintain trust in the system, it is important to report a security incident as soon as you know about it.
